name: Qiu Hou
story: Qiu Hou has always had a passion for medicine and helping others. He joined the military to use his skills in a different way and quickly rose through the ranks due to his talent and dedication. He met his wife while training and they have been married for 5 years. Qiu Hou is known for his focus and ability to remain calm under pressure, making him a valuable member of any team.
